Description: commencing an action
Example: 桜の花が咲き始めましたね。
Translation: Cherry blossoms have begun to bloom.

Description: halting an action
Example: 晩ご飯を食べ終わってからみんなゲームをした。
Translation: After finishing dinner, everyone played games.

Content: 台風が来るというニュース
Interpretation: news that a typhoon is coming
Description: to describe or state the meaning of something
Example: 骨が伸びるということです。
Translation: It means that the bones are stretched.

Interpretation: smoking is prohibited in the venue
Description: state the reason in relation to current state
Example: 清掃中につき、お足元にご注意ください。
Translation: Please watch your step during cleaning.

Description: a particular condition or limitation does not apply
Example: 年齢を問わず、どなたでも利用できます。
Translation: Regardless of age, anyone could use it.

Content: 初めてのお客様に限り
Meaning: only for・only limited to・as long as
Description: sets a condition or limitation
Example: このチケットは平日の午後に限り有効です。
Translation: This ticket is valid only on weekday afternoons.

Content: 学生のレベルに応じて
Interpretation: Ddepending on the level of the student
Description: something varies based on a certain factor or condition
Example: 給料は経験に応じて決まります。
Translation: The salary is determined depending on the experience.

Description: something is not affected by a particular factor
Example: 天候にかかわらず、イベントは予定通り行われます。
Translation: Regardless of the weather, the event will go on as scheduled.

Description: specify the time, place, location, field or subject area
Example: 会議はホテルの大会議室において行われます。
Translation: The meeting will be held in the hotel's main conference room.

Description: indicate a state or condition concerning a particular topic
Example: 研究における発見は科学の進歩に貢献します。
Translation: Discoveries in research contribute to the advancement of science.

Description: refer to a specific point in time when something occurs
Example: 出国際にパスポートが必要です。
Translation: A passport is required when leaving the country.

Interpretation: at the time of the exhibition
Meaning: on the occasion of・at the time of
Description: refer to a specific point in time when something occurs
Example: 開店に際して、特別な割引を提供します。
Translation: We offer a special discount on the occasion of the store opening.

Description: used to explain a rule or warning
Example: 試験中は携帯電話の電源を切ること。
Translation: Cell phones must be turned off during the examination.

Description: nothing else has happened since the action took place
Example: 友人とは2年前に別れたきり、会っていない。
Translation: I haven't seen my friend since we parted two years ago.

Description: something is done completely or thoroughly
Example: 彼はケーキを食べきりました。
Translation: He ate up all the cake.

Meaning: not the time to or for
Description: not in a situation where you can do of afford to do something
Example: ゆっくり泳ぐどころじゃなかったよ。
Translation: It was no time for a slow swim.

Description: emphasize a fact by presenting a contrast or contradiction
Example: 速く走ったものの、間に合わなかった。
Translation: Even though I ran fast, I didn’t make it on time.

Description: indicate a surprising or unexpected fact・emphasize an emotion
Example: 結果は嬉しいことに同じでした。
Translation: The results were happily the same.

Content: 初めて作ったにしては
Interpretation: for the first time making it
Description: something is not typical for a certain standard
Example: 彼は若いにしては落ち着いている。
Translation: He is calm for a young man.

Description: self questioning on the extent or how much have done or felt up to now
Example: どれだけ勉強したことか。
Translation: How much I have learned.
